com.example.cmput301f20t18

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cmput301f20t18.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A user within our system, contains the methods / variables for any transaction between users
    Author:
    deinum
    See Also:
    Transaction
